== Kallamala (627614) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Kallamala is a village in the [[Mannarkad]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 7700 hectares and harbouring 2912 households with total population of 12614 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 59 km. Male population is 6154 and female population is 6460. Scheduled Caste Population is 467 and Scheduled Tribes population is 2984. Census Location Code of the village is 627614<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 9807 (77.75%)
* Literate male population: 4979 (80.91%)
* Literate female population: 4828 (74.74%)
